metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Eval injection vulnerability in index.js in the syntax-error package before 1.1.1 for Node.js 0.10.x, as used in IBM Rational Application Developer and other products, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
